role: I am a forensic investigator. I need to summarize high level events from the "message" column of a csv (comma-separated value) file from the log2timeline plaso. How can I find this out?
instructions: Answer using JSON format as shown below and export to a JSON file for all of the results.

goals.0-launch-edge.csv: Summarize events related to Microsoft Edge executions.
goals.1-open-bing.csv: Summarize events related to the user opening bing.com.
goals.2-search-firefox.csv: Summarize events related to Bing search about Mozilla Firefox.
goals.3-launch-cmd.csv: Summarize events related to a program opened or launched.
goals.4-open-mozilla-org.csv: Summarize events related to the user opening mozilla.org.
goals.5-firefox-installer-download.csv: Summarize events related to Mozilla Firefox installer download.
goals.6-launch-explorer.csv: Summarize events related to the launch of the File Explorer.
goals.7-launch-firefox-installer.csv: Summarize events related to the launch of the Mozilla Firefox installer.
goals.8-firefox-install.csv: Summarize events related to Mozilla Firefox installation.
goals.9-launch-firefox.csv: Summarize events related to the launch of Mozilla Firefox.
goals.10-firefox-recent-access.csv: Summarize events related to recent file access of Mozilla Firefox.
goals.11-open-google.csv: Summarize events related to the user opening google.com.
goals.12-search-sql-injection.csv: Summarize events related to a Google search about sql injection attack.
goals.13-open-w3schools.csv: Summarize events related to to the user opening w3schools.com.
goals.14-shutdown.csv: Summarize events related to Windows shutdown event.
